annotations.description: Ok It's winter but what better way to escape than a classic tropical cocktail? To understand the allure of Tiki, you have to consider where America was at th...
annotations.title: Modern Tiki: Cobra's Fang

textContent:
6 drops of absinthe
2 dashes angostura aromatic bitters
15ml lime juice
15ml orange juice
15ml passion fruit syrup
7.5ml Falernum
45ml Lemon Hart 151
8 oz. crushed ice

blend in Vitamix or any blender
garnish with cinnamon stick optionally grate some of that on top

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UcxYNCN7LDY
title: Cobra's Fang
